name: Stickman Neighbor Welcome Home
description:
Your house becomes a dangerous place, zombie neighbor is here, say hello to him! Stickman neighbor has come to say hello and, as we think, he wants to chase you, so aware; this zombie stickman is very dangerous, he is searching for you in your house. Our new horror simulator: Stickman Neighbor: Welcome Home would teach you how to escape from zombie neighbor, which is trying to chase you.

You are in danger, stickman neighbor chases you, and he has already arrived to your house. We can never be sure which horrors awaits for you, but we are sure that you should avoid saying hello this zombie-stickman, so you have to hide and run away from him to survive. Find safest place in your house and hide or run as fast as you can and collect loot on your way, do not let zombie-neighbor chase you, run and hope that his horrors would not have frighten you.

Stickman Neighbor: Welcome Home is a free to play horror simulator. Show this zombie-stickman that it is not easy to chase you. Hide, run and escape saying hello to horrors of zombie-neighbor.
